title: Looking for a good skilled and fun team for plat+
body: Just you know we could have fun together and perhaps we could be a good team, i mainly play ADC/Jungle/mid, i can play all roles and do a decent job, but i would like ADC or jungle, if you think you could be part of us let me know in the comment and i will definitely add you.

replies.body: We can make a community scrim team, I play mid and im looking for people with good communication via discord. Just add me - Paradoxy

Hit me up ign - DYN4M1T3 
plat v solo 
plat 3 flex
i main mid but can play any but top.
yeah sure, when you reach level 30 go play a thing call ranked solo/duo or ranked flex and then you reach a rank call plat or you get pass over that and then you're in
